allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Convert Graph to TypeScript

- Rename Graph.js to Graph.ts with full type annotations
- Add ParseTreeNode, AdjacencyMatrix, DistanceMatrix, Bridge types
- Create types.ts for shared type definitions
- Export IBracket interface from Atom.ts
- Add proper TypeScript types to all Graph methods
- Fix type narrowing issues with null checks
- Add JSDoc examples for key methods like getBridges\(\)
EOF
\)")
